publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3430# Brian Adam: Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills-That the Parliament notes with regret the distressing number of motorcycle accidents and fatalities caused by diesel spills and believes that the Scottish Executive should run a road safety campaign to highlight the dangers of over-filling diesel tanks and introduce other measures to reduce diesel spills.

S1M-3430# Brian Adam: Safety Campaign on Diesel Spillsâ€”That the Parliament notes with regret the distressing number of motorcycle accidents and fatalities caused by diesel spills and believes that the Scottish Executive should run a road safety campaign to highlight the dangers of over-filling diesel tanks and introduce other measures to reduce diesel spills.
S1M-3430# Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills (lodged on 25 September 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-3430# Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills (lodged on 25 September 2002) Michael Matheson*, Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-3430# Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills (lodged on 25 September 2002) Richard Lochhead*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Colin Campbell*, Mr David Davidson*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Robin Harper*
S1M-3430# Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills (lodged on 25 September 2002) Mr John McAllion*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-3430# Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills (lodged on 25 September 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-3430# Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills (lodged on 25 September 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3430# Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills (lodged on 25 September 2002) Irene McGugan*

S1M-3430# Brian Adam: Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills-That the Parliament notes with regret the distressing number of motorcycle accidents and fatalities caused by diesel spills and believes that the Scottish Executive should run a road safety campaign to highlight the dangers of over-filling diesel tanks and introduce other measures to reduce diesel spills. Supported by: Alex Neil, Michael Matheson, Nora Radcliffe, Richard Lochhead, Ms Sandra White, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Colin Campbell, Mr David Davidson, Bruce Crawford, Mr Jamie Stone, Robin Harper, Mr John McAllion, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Tricia Marwick, Andrew Wilson, Irene McGugan
S1M-3430# Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills (lodged on 25 September 2002) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Shona Robison*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3430# Safety Campaign on Diesel Spills (lodged on 25 September 2002) Fiona Hyslop*
